body:
Thanks for going through this. It is definitely a weird situation. We haven't done one of these types of merges yet, so we haven't quite figured out the way we want to do things yet.

For reference, the PRs where the original review was done were #410 and #423, and the original branch was [peer-signing](https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/tree/peer-signing). Because of our switch to a monorepo, it is a bit hard to diff the original branch against this one, but scanning through the list of commits between the two is pretty easy.

body_html:
Thanks for going through this. It is definitely a weird situation. We haven't done one of these types of merges yet, so we haven't quite figured out the way we want to do things yet.

For reference, the PRs where the original review was done were #410 and #423, and the original branch was peer-signing. Because of our switch to a monorepo, it is a bit hard to diff the original branch against this one, but scanning through the list of commits between the two is pretty easy.
